## LayoutProp type

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Represents a value of the `CombinedCountryCodeSelector`<!-- -->'s prop that defines what kind of layout components its subcomponents are wrapped in, if any.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type LayoutProp = 'grid' | 'gridItems' | 'grid2' | 'grid2Items' | 'stack' | 'group' | 'row';
```
